product_name: Royal Robbins Discovery Pants - Women's Short
long_description: The Royal Robbins short-length Discovery Pants come in a lightweight fabric that's wrinkle resistant, has great stretch and is an exceptional choice for travel. Stretch nylon fabric is a quick-drying blend of nylon and spandex; it feels like cotton with a soft hand and subtle texture. Dri X-treme(TM) fabric treatment helps wick moisture from skin. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Zip fly, snap closure and belt loops. Rotated side seams slim the look. Secure drop-in front pockets; zip-secure back pockets. Royal Robbins Discovery pants feature boot-cut legs and a natural fit that follows body contours without being tight.
short_description: The Royal Robbins short-length Discovery Pants come in a lightweight fabric that's wrinkle resistant, has great stretch and is an exceptional choice for travel.
